page.title: 06HOME LIFE IN DENTON
page.content: Both men & women{work,}but the father is still the breadwinner. All modern facilities are available to the house hold : washing machines, tumble dryers fridge/freezers, kettles, cookers, microwave ovens & central heating. {Meals}may be set times or to suit family activities. Meals usually consist of a variety of meat,cereals, vegetables, fish, dairy products, fruit, bread & potatoes still staples. "Healthy eating" is fashionable but biscuits, cakes, cream, butter, sugar, sweets and chocolates ever popular! 98% of homes have{television}informing of national and world events,and for entertainment. All homes own a{pet, cats,rabbits,birds,hamsters,guineapigs fish,& horses. 80% keep dogs both as pets & home protectors:1 guide-dog. Most homes are insured against fire, theft etc,some fitted with alarms.
